outputs.output_descr:
1) Humanitarian & HIV issues are included in PRSPs or any equal framework/development instrument: Direct support to 4 country offices and dissemination of Guidance Note/tool on Humanitarian/HIV mainstreaming into PRSPs
2) Humanitarian & HIV/AIDS issues are addressed in CCA/UNDAFs: Support to country offices, training and dissimination of Guidance Note/tool on Humanitarian/HIV mainstreaming into UNDAFs 
3) HIV mainstreaming and programming into Disarmement Demobilization and Reintegration (DDR) processes and programs: Direct country support and programming up to 8 DDR countries 
4) HIV mainstreaming within the Humanitarian Early Recovery Cluster and into Early recovery tools (this includes field support missions and HIV cluster training workshops at country/HQ levels)
5) Knowledge products and information dissemination on Humanitarian and HIV related issues
6) Training activities for UNDP staff, RC/HC and humanitarian cluster including early recovery on humanitarian and HIV related issues - Development of training modules and implementation (in close collaboration with OCHA)
7) Local authorities are trained on humanitarian, Gender Based Violence and HIV as interlinked issues up to 4 post crisis countries (direct country support with Governance and HIV service line)
8) Reintegration & HIV programming in 2 selected post crisis countries

project_descr: Scaling Up HIV/AIDs Interventions in Emergency Settings
